name: Endustry
description:
Endustry is a game about building, exploring and surviving. Build machines and conveyor belts to collect resources. Defend your base with turrets. Keep your base warm and avoid starving.

Features:
- Survival elements.
- Conveyor belts.
- Resource management.
- Randomly generated resources .
- Turret upgrades.
- Enemy waves.
- Pixel art.
